fields.Title of Presentation: Public Relations Practitioner as Cultural Interpreters
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: The International Public Relations Research Conference
fields.Description/Abstract:
According to Cultural Interpreter or Translator model proposed by Grunig, Sriramech, Huang, and Lyra (1995), the key role of public relations practitioners, especially working for multinational corporations which hire diverse workers is to facilitate communication between different cultures within an organization. This study will examine if public relations practitioners’ understanding of different or similar cultural values facilitate communication with internal publics, in other words, workers with different cultural backgrounds, especially heterogeneous from practitioners’ cultural values by applying the model. Interview or survey will be conducted after completing literature reviews.
Role:  Principal
